name: grafana-connector
description: Example Grafana Simple JSON connector for ArangoDB.
author: ArangoDB GmbH

username.description: Username incoming requests should use to authenticate for all queries.

password.description: Password incoming requests should use to authenticate for all queries.

x1_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for x1.

x2_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for x2. Either empty or as many values as x1.

x3_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for x3. Either empty or as many values as x1.

y1_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for y1.

y2_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for y2. Either empty or as many values as y1.

y3_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for y3. Either empty or as many values as y1.

z1_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for z1.

z2_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for z2. Either empty or as many values as z1.

z3_variable.description: Comma separated list of values for z3. Either empty or as many values as z1.

target.description: Name of the target as shown in Grafana. Please note that the name can contain template variables.

collection.description: Name of the collection. Please note that the name can contain template variables.

aggregation.description: Aggregation function. Should be one of AVG, COUNT, COUNT_DISTINCT, MAX, MIN, SORTED_UNIQUE, STDDEV, STDDEV_SAMPLE, SUM, UNIQUE, VARIANCE, VARIANCE_SAMPLE, NONE. You can use '*' to get them all defined except 'NONE'.

filterExpression.description: An AQL expression used to filter data. The current document is called 'doc'.

dateName.description: Name of the field containing the date time for each data point. Note that this cannot be a nested attribute. Use 'dateExpression' in this case. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'. If both are specified than 'dateExpression' takes precedence.
Name of the field using in Grafana.

dateField.description: Name of the field containing the date time for each data point. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'.

dateExpression.description: An AQL expression for the date time. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'.
An AQL expression for the data field. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'dateField' or 'dateExpression'. If both are specified than 'dateExpression' takes precedence.

valueName.description: Name of the field containing the numerical value for each data point. Note that this cannot be a nested attribute. Use 'valueExpression' in this case. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'. If both are specified than 'valueExpression' takes precedence.
Name of the field using in Grafana.

valueField.description: Name of the field containing the numerical value for each data point. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'.

Name of the field containing the numerical value for each data point. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'. If both are specified than 'valueExpression' takes precedence.

valueExpression.description: An AQL expression for a numerical value. The current document is called 'doc'. Either set 'valueField' or 'valueExpression'.
